channel.title: School of Life on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in School of Life on Rusland 1

item.title: Gospod – Holy Metal and the Seven Deadly Sins
item.description: Greed The Main Sins of Humanity (2021) contains seven tracks, which shouldn’t come as a surprise. Greed is the first, and it makes you want more. The lyrics were not found online, but here they are, with спасибо (thanks) to Gospod.

item.title: Learn Russian with Short Stories (1): Anastasia Reads Tolstoy
item.description: In part 1 Косточка (The Plum Stone), and in part 2 Старый дед и внучек (The Old Man and His Little Grandson). Text (both short) available on rvb.ru, respectively here and here. More Tolstoy Лев Толстой (Leo Tolstoy) also in part 10, Филипок (Filipok, 2019, 4 m), but this time from the kitchen.
